item.title: Innovate, Microblogs!
item.description:
I came up with this idea while listening to an episode of Hypercritical live:

Technically, any twitter/app.net client (which includes the official web interface) can easily achieve this.

Then I thought of extending this feature beyond one-to-one conversations, say, using one post to create a simple survey with custonized response buttons for followers. Their replies can be aggregated and graphed under the original post.

Obviously this extension would require more work done by the service providers. But I think ulimately it will encourage users to interact more, benefiting themselves and the services.

It’s time to start innovating again, Twitter/App.net/client makers.

You are welcome.
